name: Extra Discounts On Products For WooCommerce
author: jspades056

sections.description: Extra Discounts On Products For WooCommerce allows you to set up extra discounts on the same product for your WooCommerce. It is designed to be simple and easy to set up in just a few minutes.
sections.installation:
1. Upload extra-discounts-on-products-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate WooCommerce in your WordPress site if it is not activated already.
  3. Activate Extra Discounts On Products For WooCommerce through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

short_description: Extra Discounts On Products For WooCommerce, this plugin is a simple plugin to set extra discounts on the same product for WooCommerce!
description: Extra Discounts On Products For WooCommerce allows you to set up extra discounts on the same product for your WooCommerce. It is designed to be simple and easy to set up in just a few minutes.
